sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-tag size="large" :class="{ active: active}">
		{{ keyword }}
	</van-tag>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	props: ["keyword", "index", "active"],
	data() {
		return {
			// tagactive: 0,
		};
	},
	methods: {
		setActive(index){
		    this.tagactive = index
		}
	},
};
</script>

<style>
.van-tag {
	padding: 8px 12px;
	font-weight: 300;
	font-size: 14px;
	line-height: 16px;
	white-space: nowrap;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	border-radius: 2px;
	max-width: 343px;
	margin: 12px 12px 0 0;
	overflow: hidden;
	color: #4d4d4d;
	background-color: #fafafa;
}

.keywords-tags .van-tag.active {
	color: #00c792;
	background-color: #e5f9f4;
}
</style>
